For multiple myeloma and plasmacytoma, other risk factors include the following:          - Being black.    - Being male.    - Having a personal history of MGUS or plasmacytoma.    - Being exposed to radiation or certain chemicals.",CancerGov,Plasma Cell Neoplasms (Including Multiple Myeloma)
